Key Match Events: Benches and bullpens cleared in the bottom of the sixth inning in Game 4 of the ALDS after a hard tag at second base applied by Anthony Volpe on Maikel Garcia.
Anthony Volpe applied a hard tag on Maikel Garcia during a 3-3-6 double play.
Jazz Chisholm Jr. started jawing with Maikel Garcia after the tag, leading to benches clearing.
A 'Yankees suck' chant broke out in the ballpark.
Royals pitcher Angel Zerpa struck out Gleyber Torres to end the top of the seventh inning and stared down Torres and the Yankees' bench.
